subject: mathematics
explanation: Division is the inverse of multiplication. 12 ÷ 3 = 4 because 3 × 4 = 12.
explanationHindi: विभाजन गुणन का व्युत्क्रम है। 12 ÷ 3 = 4 क्योंकि 3 × 4 = 12।

subject: mathematics
questionText: Explain what a prime number is and give three examples.
questionTextHindi: अभाज्य संख्या क्या है, समझाइए और तीन उदाहरण दीजिए।

hints.text: A prime number is only divisible by 1 and itself.
Examples include 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, etc. These numbers have no other divisors.
2 is the only even prime number. All other prime numbers are odd.

acceptableAnswers: A prime number is a natural number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself
A number that can only be divided by 1 and itself
keyPoints: They have exactly two divisors: 1 and themselves
2 is the smallest and only even prime
explanation: A prime number is a natural number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself. Examples: 2, 3, 5, 7, 11.
explanationHindi: अभाज्य संख्या 1 से बड़ी एक प्राकृतिक संख्या है जिसका कोई सकारात्मक भाजक नहीं है सिवाय 1 और स्वयं के। उदाहरण: 2, 3, 5, 7, 11।

subject: mathematics
questionText: If a rectangle has length 8 cm and width 5 cm, what is its area?
questionTextHindi: यदि एक आयत की लंबाई 8 सेमी और चौड़ाई 5 सेमी है, तो इसका क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
explanation: The area of a rectangle is calculated by multiplying its length by its width. Area = 8 × 5 = 40 cm².
explanationHindi: आयत का क्षेत्रफल इसकी लंबाई को चौड़ाई से गुणा करके निकाला जाता है। क्षेत्रफल = 8 × 5 = 40 सेमी²।

subject: mathematics
questionText: What is the derivative of f(x) = 3x² + 2x + 1?
explanation: Using the power rule: d/dx(x^n) = n·x^(n-1). So d/dx(3x²) = 6x, d/dx(2x) = 2, d/dx(1) = 0. Therefore, f'(x) = 6x + 2.
explanationHindi: घात नियम का उपयोग करते हुए: d/dx(x^n) = n·x^(n-1)। तो d/dx(3x²) = 6x, d/dx(2x) = 2, d/dx(1) = 0। इसलिए, f'(x) = 6x + 2।
